ThingDef.label: gau claw arm
ThingDef.description: Even an isolated Gaurenlen queen's power becomes stretched when spread over a larger space meaning that the arm is less functional than the claw, but this is still a legendary weapon and more than suitable replacement!

ThingDef.label: gau claw
ThingDef.description: A legendary set of claws teeming with magic, giving you the power of an incarnate Guaranlen queen.

ThingDef.label: gau arm
ThingDef.description: Even an isolated Gaurenlen queen's power becomes stretched when spread over a larger space. A gau hand is a better replacement for a missing finger than a full gau arm.

ThingDef.label: gau leg
ThingDef.description: Even an isolated Gaurenlen queen's power becomes stretched when spread over a larger space. A gau foot is a better replacement for a missing toe than a full gau leg.

ThingDef.label: gau hand
ThingDef.description: A fully isolated Gauranlen queen powering this hand allows for an immense exertion of magical strength and full dexterity.

ThingDef.label: gau foot
ThingDef.description: A fully isolated Gauranlen queen powering this foot allows for an immense exertion of magical power and full dexterity.

ThingDef.label: gau ear
ThingDef.description: With the use of a Gauranlen queen in the creation of this ear, you're able to detect even the smallest vibrations through the wind, under the planet's surface, as well as all previous enhancements.

ThingDef.label: gau jaw
ThingDef.description: The user's mouth and voice are completely transformed, while they can still chew for etiquette, a secondary stomach within their mouth breaks larger food items into more managable pieces anyway. The user's voice is angelic and smooth, giving you the feeling that you might have a bountiful harvest this year.

ThingDef.label: gau eye
ThingDef.description: The introduction of a Gauranlen queen into the eye enables controllable visibility of all wavelengths of light, tracking of multiple sources of movement, and all previous enhancements.

ThingDef.label: gaurenlen queen conscience
ThingDef.description: Where the dyradic connector only allowed the Gauranlen queen to compensate in the brain telepathicaly, a localised queen allows her to directly compensate, as well as enhance areas of the brain.

ThingDef.label: gau lung
ThingDef.description: The introduction of a secondary embryo into the dryadic lung allows it to house a Gauranlen queen, who can locally and magically manage and enhance the functions of a lung.

ThingDef.label: gau stomach
ThingDef.description: The introduction of a secondary embryo into the dryadic stomach allows it to house a Gauranlen queen, who can locally and magically manage and enhance the functions of a stomach.

ThingDef.label: gau liver
ThingDef.description: The introduction of a secondary embryo into the dryadic liver allows it to house a Gauranlen queen, who can locally and magically manage and enhance the functions of a liver.

ThingDef.label: gau kidney
ThingDef.description: The introduction of a secondary embryo into the dryadic kidney allows it to house a Gauranlen queen, who can locally and magically manage and enhance the functions of a kidney

ThingDef.label: gau heart
ThingDef.description: The introduction of a secondary embryo into the dryadic heart allows it to house a Gauranlen queen, who can locally and magically manage and enhance the functions of a heart.

ThingDef.label: gauranlen roots
ThingDef.description: By more directly utilizing a Gauranlen seed, the user is able to effectively 'grow' the roots of a Gauranlen tree inside of their body, the Gauranlen queen housed inside the seed controls the roots to provide symbiotic support.

ThingDef.label: barkskin gland
ThingDef.description: A more complex piece of runic organics, a gland inside the body that causes the user's skin to become hard and fibrous, a faux-wood with a similar hardness and toughness to a barkskin dryad.
